title: 820-3332 water damage
message:
boots into os- no chime
randomly logs out then freezes kb + tpad
screen doesn't turn off when lid is closed
shitty looking shmoo on left usb port 
multicoloured pads near u5701, u6100 and u7000

title: 820-3332 water damage
message: yes I have, there was no apparent water damage, although i havent tried to run asd yet, so I will do that. I tell all my water damage customers 1-8 weeks and this guy called on day 7, so its sitting in the I'll get to it later pile
